18:00 <vmassol> Enygma`: regarding https://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13083 is this hard to implement? Is that why it wasn't done as part of the WebHome hiding for wiki links?  
18:00 <vmassol> I'm wondering if we should have if for 7.4.2  
18:00 <vmassol> WDYT?  
18:06 <Enygma`> vmassol: there are a couple of things to consider and discuss  
18:07 <Enygma`> for example tmortagne (or mflorea, don`t remember exactly) was saying at some point that we should not generate an untyped link in wysiwyg if the user already explicitly selected the document (with the wizard), since the untyped link's behavior is pretty unpredictable right now and the user might not get what he asked for  
18:08 <tmortagne> (don't know if it was me but I agree with that)  
18:08 <Enygma`> the alternative (to using untyped links) would be to use the space: link type, thus avoiding "WebHome", but I`m not sure what we gain by that in terms of usability
